Text: Allow me to dry your hair.
Thank you.
Was the temperature of the bath to your liking?

It was a little hot, but I prefer it that way. I was
able to cleanse my mind of any unwanted thoughts as
well.
I'm pleased to hear it.

Bathing truly is a wondrous thing. It clears the
mind and doesn't require any extraneous thoughts.
And yet here you are thinking them all the same.

No need to fuss over minor details. Now then,
I should really begin recalculating the taxes.

I would like to make sure that our stores are also
capable of living up to my promises...
It appears that your mind is occupied by your work.
Is that not a good thing?

I wonder if you know the rumors circulating around
the port, my lady...

They say that you apparently cast no reflection in
mirrors.

Yet here I am gazing at myself in one at this very
moment...

*sigh*... It seems yet another baseless rumor is
making the rounds.

Rumors are part and parcel of being something other
than human. Such talk is unavoidable.
...No matter. So, what is on tonight's menu?

You certainly have a healthy appetite, my lady.
Dinner should nearly be ready.

Well, with smaller meals the quicker I get hungry.
There isn't much I can do about that.

You eat so frequently, and yet your figure...
Ah, forgive me, my lady.
Why Mary... Was that a compliment?
A few minutes later—
What a wonderful aroma... This must be galette.
Yes, I was told it contains trout and carrots.
My, that sounds very different from our usual meals.

Yes, it seems there is a new chef in charge of
today's meal. A young go-getter who has been making a
name for himself of late.

He apparently knows several other dishes, each of
which he takes great pride in.

Well, it sounds as if I have much to look forward to.
Now, for the taste...

Seasoned fish and fresh carrots, wonderfully united
by a sprinking of flour... Delicious!
I can't stop myself from eating it!
Heehee, it gladdens me to see that you—

...Is something the matter, my lady? You've stopped
eating.
...I've had my fill. Thank you.
What?! B-But there is still more to come!

I'm sorry. But with so much on my mind and my being a
light eater to begin with, I simply can't continue...

Still, it pains me to let such fine food go cold.
If only there were some way to easily re-heat it...

That would be convenient, but I'm afraid no such
technique exists...

Yes, perhaps one will be invented someday.
I would greatly welcome it.

...I will just have to stay alive until that time
arrives. For now, thank you for the meal.
Today was a most rewarding day.
Despite you doing nothing but eat?

Don't be silly. I performed my duties as required,
no?
Hehe, I was simply teasing you.
This was a good day for me as well.
Oh? How so?

I feel I was able to learn a lot about you today,
my lady.
And that is a good thing?
Yes, of course. At least for me it is.

You certainly are an odd one. *yawn*... I think I'll
turn in for the day.
As you wish. Good night, Lady Elisabeth.

This is still some time before Elisabeth would enter
her deep slumber.
Many years pass, bringing us to the modern age—
